::Rex/Firearm::

Rex and Firearm look at the prisoners at the cell, then looking at Brix. 
"Allright, see ya," Rex says as Brix walks off.

Rex looks at Firearm. "You'll be allright guarding them?"

Firearm nods, "I can handle."

Rex walks over to an intercom, activating it for the prisoners to hear, the 
energy walls otherwise defeating all sound.

"Firearm is standing guard," he says into it, "He's triggerhappy, as I'm sure 
you've noticed, so try not to piss him off. We'll be back for you guys later."

Rex turns and walks out of the room, heading for the bridge. He nearly runs 
into Battera before he sees her, jumping back and aiming all his guns at her. 
Her signature did not register as Maximal, and that was a bad sign.

"Who are you?" he says, his guns ready.
